query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) as total_products,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pc.productId IS NOT NULL THEN p.id END) as categorized_products,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pc.productId IS NULL THEN p.id END) as uncategorized_products
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.productId;

  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pc.productId IS NOT NULL THEN p.id END) as categorized_products,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pc.productId IS NULL THEN p.id END) as uncategorized_products
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.productId;
